verses.verse: <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> art thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I <S%H7378>plead<s%> with thee: yet let me <S%H1696>talk<s%> with thee of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>: Wherefore doth the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? wherefore are all they <S%H7951>happy<s%> that deal <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>? talk: or, reason the case with thee

Thou hast <S%H5193>planted<s%> them, yea, they have taken <S%H8327>root<s%>: they <S%H3212>grow<s%>, yea, they bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: thou art <S%H7138>near<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and far <S%H7350>from<s%> their <S%H3629>reins<s%>. they grow: Heb. they go on

But thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3045>knowest<s%> me: thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> me, and <S%H974>tried<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward thee: pull them <S%H5423>out<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%>, and <S%H6942>prepare<s%> them for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter<s%>. toward: Heb. with thee

How long shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of every <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%>, for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein? the <S%H929>beasts<s%> are <S%H5595>consumed<s%>, and the <S%H5775>birds<s%>; because they <S%H559>said<s%>, He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> our last <S%H319>end<s%>.

If thou hast <S%H7323>run<s%> with the <S%H7273>footmen<s%>, and they have <S%H3811>wearied<s%> thee, then how canst thou <S%H8474>contend<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%>? and if in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, wherein thou <S%H982>trustedst<s%>, they wearied thee, then how wilt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H1347>swelling<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>?

For even thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, even they have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with thee; yea, they have <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H4392>multitude<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee: <S%H539>believe<s%> them not, though they <S%H1696>speak<s%> fair <S%H2896>words<s%> unto thee. they have called: or, they cried after thee fully fair: Heb. good things

I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, I have <S%H5203>left<s%> mine <S%H5159>heritage<s%>; I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dearly <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H341>enemies<s%>. the dearly: Heb. the love

Mine <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is unto me as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest<s%>; it crieth <S%H5414>out<s%> <S%H6963><s%> against me: therefore have I <S%H8130>hated<s%> it. crieth: or, yelleth: Heb. giveth out his voice

Mine <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is unto me as a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%>, the <S%H5861>birds<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> are against her; <S%H3212>come<s%> ye, <S%H622>assemble<s%> all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H857>come<s%> to <S%H402>devour<s%>. speckled: or, taloned come to: or, cause them to come to

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H7462>pastors<s%> have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, they have <S%H947>trodden<s%> my <S%H2513>portion<s%> under <S%H947>foot<s%>, they have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>portion<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>. pleasant: Heb. portion of desire

They have <S%H7760>made<s%> it <S%H8076>desolate<s%>, and being <S%H8077>desolate<s%> it <S%H56>mourneth<s%> unto me; the whole <S%H776>land<s%> is made <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, because no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>layeth<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

The <S%H7703>spoilers<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon all high <S%H8205>places<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: no <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, but shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H6975>thorns<s%>: they have put themselves to <S%H2470>pain<s%>, but shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%>: and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H8393>revenues<s%> because of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. they shall: or, ye shall

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> against all mine <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, that <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which I have caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>; Behold, I will pluck them <S%H5428>out<s%> of their <S%H127>land<s%>, and pluck <S%H5428>out<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And it shall come to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> that I have plucked them <S%H5428>out<s%> I will <S%H7725>return<s%>, and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on them, and will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>heritage<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will <S%H3925>diligently<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; then shall they be <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But if they will not <S%H8085>obey<s%>, I will <S%H5428>utterly<s%> pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
